name: A Long Way Down (itch)
description:
Submission for ScoreSpace Jam #6 | Theme: Karma

Q: How does this game relate to the theme ?

A:  According to the theory of Karma, what happens to a person, happens because they caused it with their actions. We decided to incorporate this element into our game through the player killing enemies. Although killing enemies gives the player more points, they will suffer in the future as the game will become harder from the additional bullets from the dead enemies.

Q: What is the goal of the game? How do you play this game?

A: Make your way down a labyrinth full of monsters. and get as far down as possible to get the highest score. Avoid incoming bullets from enemies or kill them for more points! Beware though, your actions have consequences.

Move with the "AD" or "left/right arrow "keys. 

Jump with the "W", "up arrow" or space bar.
